Title: Relates to exempting amounts received from any financial settlement for childhood sexual abuse for determining eligibility for or amount of benefits
Summary: Exempts amounts received from any financial settlement for childhood sexual abuse for determining eligibility for or amount of benefits under any program provided under the social security law.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-n, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exempting amounts received from any financial settlement for childhood sexual abuse for determining eligibility for or amount of benefits
